short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays suggested content from Quark Docurated.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enable your sales and marketing teams to find, customize, and share the most relevant content â€” fast. Studies suggest that sales teams spend more than 30 percent of their time searching for the most relevant content, and 65 percent of the content created by the marketing team goes unused.
With the Quark Docurated available as a Google Chrome Extension, it is now easier to search and browse the right content for sales and marketing representatives to share content with the right audience thereby boosting productivity. No more switching between applications, perform all content-related activities right from within the platform of your choice - CRM, mailbox, marketing automation software, and more.

AI-driven metadata tagging capabilities helps in creating an advanced taxonomy and thus boosting search speed. Content analytics helps in generating true value out of every asset and delivers a real-time consumption trend that drives content scoring.

Features:
- Content management
- Content sharing
- Collection sharing
- Measure content performance
